run.summary: Deep investigation into reef as foundational AI infrastructure; reframed from file format to AI-native syntax; submitted PEP 541 transfer request for `reef` PyPI package.

what-worked.item: Syntax-over-format reframe crystallized reef's value proposition
Confidence matrix methodology for evaluating viability (72% → 81%)

what-didnt.item: Context blob got overwritten by /whatif work mid-session

next-session.step: Rename internal terminology: blob→polip, glob→reef, sprout→spawn throughout codebase
Rename package: zoox→reef in pyproject.toml, imports, CLI entry point
Keep zoox as git remote alias until PyPI transfer approved
Design .reef file format spec with reserved sections (decisions, next, context, files, related)
